Go look at the spending from those races. Look at what happened in the primaries. Look at the messaging. Look at the donors. Look at who made money. Look at the outcomes.

When it‚Äôs all stick and no carrot, the base loses incentive to show up. BUT this is only a problem if the Dems actually care about winning. 

The 2020 cycle made it clear that winning is less important than getting paid. Browbeat the base, motivate the donors. Get paid, repeat.

Further: Democrats leverage the base‚Äôs legitimate fears around ‚Äúcultural‚Äù issues in order to force complacency with their servitude of corporate interests.

For example: Forget student loan forgiveness, Roe is on the ballot! Forget universal healthcare or we‚Äôll lose gay marriage! https://t.co/76YY616t8j

@Seanrcooper @tampa_tweeter @santiagomayer_ Good for you, but not everyone is motivated to go to bat for a fire hydrant. The Dems have to provide something more substantial than ‚Äúnot Susan Collins‚Äù in order to win in a state where independent voters outnumber both democrats and republicans. Maine chose the devil they knew.

Notice the patterns. Don‚Äôt reward bad behavior. Send money to abortion funds instead.

Volunteer if you still believe the political industrial complex is worth helping along, but don‚Äôt let them get richer on our suffering. https://t.co/v9b7F1Z5tB

@realMGHein @IvLumpkins @HeemanFragbard @geomathMEW A lot of people have shown they‚Äôre capable of looking past disabled people in the last few years. Including all three choices for Governor. ¬Ø\_(„ÉÑ)_/¬Ø

@realMGHein @IvLumpkins @HeemanFragbard @geomathMEW Truthfully, I think being anti-mask counts as evil at this point in time. My last stay in the hospital really cleared that up for me.

If someone could talk some sense into him on that front, I‚Äôd be all in. For now, I‚Äôm really not feeling like lifting a finger for any of them.

@realMGHein @IvLumpkins @HeemanFragbard @geomathMEW Hunkler strikes me as the most principled of the options, but I can‚Äôt in good conscience vote for a medical doctor who doesn‚Äôt support mandatory masking in 2022. 

Not that Mills or LePage will do better. I really don‚Äôt trust any of them to protect my interests. Shit sandwich.

@stvienicks4prez I believe the best way to keep money out of politics is not to put it there in the first place, so I don‚Äôt throw cash into races anymore. That said, if someone has a phone bank list or a text list, I‚Äôm happy to donate time.
Ope, I was wrong. https://t.co/88aA7MqAcC
Cop dropped out of the race, but I will bet you anything he doesn‚Äôt get charged. RI has a nasty habit of hiding cops who break the law in other departments. https://t.co/M14rvzhZtx
@ongreenthings We don‚Äôt have elected judges for criminal cases. I think probate judges might be elected but‚Ä¶ not quite the same impact.

@TiffanyBond @jaramil4 @tampa_tweeter @santiagomayer_ This. And: the people who paid for the polls has a vested interest in the results turning out a certain way. To that end, most of the polls didn‚Äôt even mention all of the candidates in the race. The data was bad.

@tampa_tweeter @santiagomayer_ The establishment democrats idiotically steamrolled the primary, completely overriding the chance for Mainers to choose a candidate they genuinely preferred to Collins. They ran a sock puppet and cashed in on the grift.
@Steve80695844 Respectfully: shut the fuck up, Steve.

Kinda glad my healthcare team is telling me to give this other med that makes me sleep ~16 hours a day a week to see if it works because, between the physical pain and the politics, being present in the world right now is fucking unbearable.

Don‚Äôt tell my bank account, though.ü•¥
@Steve80695844 We need to make the plutocrats uncomfortable if we want them to stop making our lives harder. That‚Äôs strategy, not emotion.
RT @LolOverruled: Please do not give money to the Democratic Party today. Give it to orgs that give funds and aid directly to people seekin‚Ä¶

This applies to Senators, too. 

Voting for and donating to pre-selected oligarchs is what got us here. THEY REMAIN COMFORTABLE IF WE PLAY THE GAME THE WAY THEY TELL US TO.

You really wanna save the country? Take a shit in Clarence Thomas‚Äô coffee.

I hope anyone who serves a SCOTUS justice‚Äîat a restaurant, cafe, dry cleaner, whatever‚Äîtakes a moment to make their life more difficult today.

I‚Äôm done pretending sanctioned rallies in approved locations mean anything. We need make these people actually feel the pressure.
Written in Maine Med‚Äôs ED. https://t.co/8MFrkjyXkg

@OXDAGAWD @smoke_nd_pearlz I‚Äôm not upset. I‚Äôm tired of people derailing conversations about practices which deny healthcare by touting higher risks while also blaming fat people for the medical profession‚Äôs refusal to act as though fat people face ANY health risks that can‚Äôt be solved by not being fat.

don‚Äôt call it a comeback
it‚Äôs been here for years https://t.co/K9cD956EZu
@anylaurie16 @GlibGirl Only when the poors do it.

@OXDAGAWD @smoke_nd_pearlz What the fuck does that have to do with the way doctors refuse to take fat people‚Äôs medical concerns seriously?

If you think we are at higher risk, either we deserve to be taken seriously by doctors or you are advocating for eugenics. Period.

@OXDAGAWD @smoke_nd_pearlz So‚Ä¶ doesn‚Äôt that mean her concerns should have been taken MORE seriously since she would have been, by your logic, at HIGHER risk of something being seriously wrong?

If not, please just say you want fat people to die and leave.
@ongreenthings And if anyone runs and tries to deviate from that model, they get branded as a loony üôÉ

@2020LawGrad @kaylampetrie Public defender with severe depression: 10
Big Law: 2

Like, can someone tell Sara Gideon she‚Äôs up at bat? 

She‚Äôs gotta still have a couple milli kicking around in that campaign account and Ted Cruz basically made sure the FEC doesn‚Äôt have any legal authority so‚Ä¶ let‚Äôs go, girl.

I‚Äôm not suggesting that well qualified buyers have a moral obligation to tour Susan Collins‚Äô home and hide shrimp in every conceivable location‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶I‚Äôm outright saying it. Use your financial privilege for good. https://t.co/bmJsHS4Rmr
@jesreaver Fondly remembering the night after the bar exam, for which my ID number was 151 and which I took as a sign from god that my liver needed to be taught a lesson.

I dare anyone to go back in time and tell my 24 year old self that in ten years ‚Äúmaking bad choices with trees and a big juicy hunk of meat‚Äù would look like this.

(Or go back 1 year and tell me I drink Hint water now because seltzer is too hardcore ü•¥) https://t.co/YynT0BB2Gl
Ok so last summer I was still in guilty pleasure/closeted/questioning territory but at this point I am prepared to be loud and proud about it: Harry Styles fuckin slaps.
@Gritty20202 Been to the ER 4 times in the last month WITH a marketplace silver plan; can confirm üôÉ

NGL, I was super into the idea of Sam Hunkler until I found out he‚Äôs a physician who doesn‚Äôt believe in public health.

The disappointments keep on coming. üôÉ

https://t.co/BIiIkzBBCK
Please excuse me while I scream into a pillow for several hours.

Endoscopy report came back & ruled out both ‚Äúfaking‚Äù & ‚Äútoo much weed‚Äù as my issue. Might‚Äôve been cool if they read that before I was discharged but, due to the *~not a big deal anymore ~* pandemic, Maine Med only has space for people who are actively incompatible with life rn.
@ninaturner You know it‚Äôs the second one. Look no further than Sara Gideon.
@Sethrogen @sithix Okay but if you‚Äôre really down to pay $20 a minute for a cam show, you should really pop into these DMs. üëÄ
@blackgirlinmain I‚Äôm a little peeved that she‚Äôs doing $2500 a head shows for Adam Schiff when he‚Äôs got a would-be first ever trans congressperson on the ballot against him.

@Al_Cleveland_ All of this is real good. Thank you. I‚Äôve been in the ‚Äúcannot access joy‚Äù space for a month and I know there‚Äôs a mindset shift that has to come with this. I‚Äôll make a list. 

AND: I‚Äôve wanted to know you irl for like years. If you ever wanna have a vent sesh, feel free to hmu üíï
@MonteuxJennifer Thanks for this. I‚Äôll make sure to note weather as I‚Äôm tracking üíï

@JustRinaLeigh This is really helpful. I‚Äôm thinking that tracking and noting when I have ‚Äúbetter‚Äù days will be good for my mindset. Thanks üíï

Side note: I bought two blueberry bushes to plant near Nico today. Would  love to get you some when they‚Äôre ready to pick üíó

@ilanaslightly Gonna give it a try!

Thank you so much for sharing üíó
@ilanaslightly From my earlier bouts, I know this to be mostly true. AND ALSO: I hate that normalizing increasingly high levels of pain is A Thing and I‚Äôm sorry you‚Äôve had to do it üíó
@literElly Have you noticed any patterns to the days that don‚Äôt feel totally unbearable? I guess I‚Äôm trying to find coping skills so that I can get a couple of those under my belt.

I spent a decade at 4/10. It wasn‚Äôt great. I had JUST found a way out when this hit and I‚Äôm fucking devastated. Resentful. Angry. Sad. Scared.

I know there has to be a way. I know people live like this. I know there isn‚Äôt another option. I have to figure it out. So. Skill share?

I‚Äôm publicly vulnerable. I can‚Äôt do *~polished & collected~*. It‚Äôs good & bad, but it‚Äôs what I‚Äôve got. This is still hard.

So. I‚Äôm accepting that I need to learn to live in severe pain. Not 4/10, but 7-9 out of 10. Daily.

So, earnestly, I‚Äôm asking: how do people live like this?

@butthetruthis1 @robjceo @bangordailynews She was on the ballot. Once RCV took effect, some of her votes went to Poliquin, but enough to take Golden over the line went to him.

DOCTOR: it‚Äôs against my principles to send you home on opioids

ME: I agree. I can‚Äôt live on oxycodone. it‚Äôs really disruptive.

DOCTOR: right. let‚Äôs try lyrica instead

ME: *takes one lyrica* hey wait‚Ä¶ this‚Ä¶ doesn‚Äôt‚Ä¶ do‚Ä¶ anything‚Ä¶ for‚Ä¶ pain‚Ä¶ *can‚Äôt wake up for 12 hours*
I am once again asking democrats to stop looking to Hillary fucking Clinton as a source on how to win elections.

@unfoundbassist My doctor changed her tune when I told her she‚Äôd also need to document that I haven‚Äôt puked once and that hot showers and capsaicin don‚Äôt help if she wanted to list that as my diagnosis. Still gonna stop to make sure the next guy doesn‚Äôt try and hit me with that again.
Also, lol, no I did not get any answers and yes, I still experience pain every time I eat üôÉ

Please pray for my friends and family during these trying times, as I am being discharged with instructions to avoid both dairy and cannabis and also I‚Äôm going to start getting my period again for the first time in over a decade.
@butthetruthis1 @robjceo @bangordailynews It‚Äôs a ranked choice vote. Bond literally got Golden the seat last time.
@the_milky_white Instead of wrath, we‚Äôre just gonna go ahead and do gay sloth next month.

@OrganizerMemes Be gentle with yourself. Give yourself some time to *~not person~*. Lower your expectations about productivity. Lower than that. 

If Anon is a candidate, feel free to hit my DMs, because probably they were gaslit for the whole ride and are going to need to put that somewhere.

@murphelaw @PridePortland I had an EKG and exams in the hallway. I was lucky enough to get an ER room after like 10 hrs and a room on a partial COVID unit about 8 hrs later. But. 18hrs to get a room, and I‚Äôm wearing a mask 24/7 while very sick and I can‚Äôt have anyone visit, even to bring a fresh mask.

I can‚Äôt BELIEVE what I‚Äôm hearing about no masks at @PridePortland. From the fifth floor at Maine Med, where I can‚Äôt have visitors because the only bed available for a high risk patient was in a partial COVID unit, I‚Äôm telling you: it‚Äôs a really fucking bad time to get sick.

When Pride turns out to be a super spreader event after you couldn‚Äôt be bothered to cover your face, how are you going to feel?

When the BA4 or BA5 variant gets branded as being prevalent in LGBTQ+ populations, how are you going to feel?

It‚Äôs like a condom for your face, guys. https://t.co/XUfD076wlY

@blackgirlinmain My partner was losing it at Pride today. They said nobody was masked and it was super crowded. So, SO disheartening to see‚Äîespecially when I‚Äôm a high risk person who could only get a hospital bed in a partial-COVID unit and I‚Äôm wearing a mask 24/7, unable to have visitors‚Ä¶
@MissedFrizzle Yell-laughed at this in my hospital bed, where I celebrated with low back pain and a BRAT diet.
@OrganizerMemes A mutual aid project in your municipality.

I want to believe this is fake but I don‚Äôt.

I‚Äôm in the hospital so I can‚Äôt show up like big gay Rambo, but y‚Äôall wear your sharpest stilettos and stompiest combat boots tomorrow, you hear me? https://t.co/EDUhgpOs08
@elburnett We gotta go talk to Sam Hunkler.

Got admitted. Wrote my @PortlandPhoenix column on a hallway hospital bed like a champ.

FB ads are bringing up progressively more upsetting & obscure pharmaceuticals. 

Feeling grateful for my past self, who ordered 3M Aura N95s before I knew how long I‚Äôd be wearing one today.

(Ok, so this was mostly acid/bile built up. I do actually feel like I‚Äôm getting care now.

In related news: I just did some kind of numbing shot in prep for an endoscopy and when I realized my throat was too numb to swallow, I blurted out ‚Äúhappy pride‚Äù before I could stop myself)

@alymcknight Remember that it will end eventually. The practice materials are designed to demoralize you. They are way harder than the exam. All the dumbasses that are lawyers now passed it, too, and you have way better understanding of this shit than they do.

(and by ‚Äúmalpractice suit I‚Äôm gonna bring‚Äù I mostly mean ‚Äúmalpractice suit my estate is gonna bring.‚Äù When this shit kills me, every one of my queer millennial friends better get a home out of it.)
Literally the only thing giving me any comfort today is the size of the malpractice suit I‚Äôm gonna bring when this is all over, I swear to god.
I mean, he lost but like‚Ä¶ a candidate for the House of Representatives openly advocated for LGBTQ genocide and 11,000 people agreed.
Welp. That took less time than expected. https://t.co/gaLqqMASa6

Also, since I haven‚Äôt taken my pain meds yet today & I‚Äôm feeling extra spiteful about having to knock myself out to avoid begging my partners to euthanize me again: a great big FUCK YOU to anyone who thinks insurance companies provide choices or access to timely care.
RT @Gritty20202: Democratic voters like to deflect to Manchin and Sinema, as if those two weren't doing exactly what Democratic leadership‚Ä¶
PLEASE JUST WEAR A FUCKING N95. When you inevitably need a hospital in the days to come, you‚Äôll be glad you did what you could to keep their numbers down.

I‚Äôve been waiting 5 days to get an x-ray talking about a surgical clip in the wrong place & CT scan erroneously claiming I have a gallbladder re-read.

My care team said there‚Äôs nothing they can do until I spike a fever. Literally going septic is the only way to move up the list.

I can‚Äôt get a surgical CONSULT until mid-July because our healthcare system is too overwhelmed to help people who are experiencing 8/10 pain daily with diagnosed illness, but no clear signs of imminent death.

I am on day 4 of round 4 of clear liquids in the last 2 months and the sounds my guts are making are TRULY HORRIFYING. 

The only time I‚Äôm convinced I‚Äôm not currently dying is when I take the pain meds I‚Äôve been trying to avoid since the ER on Thursday.
@MarieFollayttar @SteveCollinsSJ @WilliamLRolfe Yeah, this strikes me as an ad targeted to people who may not have a solid grounding in civics and also has the flavor of a scam targeting seniors.
